definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
Liwan district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong

sentences.english: Here are the three steps of drawing a sketch map of Siu Sai Wan.
sentences.chinese: 以下是绘画小西湾略图的三个步骤。

sentences.english: It's crazy Pattaya on the Gulf of Thailand.
Shau Kei Wan is a good place to get supplies for the hike.
sentences.chinese: 筲箕湾是徒步旅行的好地方。

sentences.english: A similar trend can be seen in Irvine's new shopping centre.
sentences.chinese: 同样的现象也出现于亚尔湾新建成的购物中心。

sentences.english: A diver explores wire coral in Japan's Suruga Bay.
sentences.chinese: 一位潜水者探险铁丝珊瑚在日本的Suruga湾。

sentences.english: Deep Water Bay Drive, H. K.
There is a low nutrient level in the Aoshan Bay.
sentences.chinese: 鳌山湾属营养水平较低的海域。

sentences.english: A pedestrian way passage links up the footbridge across Siu Sai Wan Road.
sentences.chinese: 行人通道連接横跨小西湾道的行人天桥。

sentences.english: A middling placer deposit of tin has been discovered in Jiudaowan district.
sentences.chinese: 九道湾地区已发现中型砂锡矿床。

sentences.english: Ok, now the place we are coming to is the Shengtangwan.
sentences.chinese: 好了，现在我们来到的地方就是神堂湾。

sentences.english: Diana Sterling lived in the Back Bay, only half a mile from your residence.
sentences.chinese: 斯黛安住在巴克湾，离你的寓所不到一公里。

sentences.english: Pictured above, a view of the Marina Bay Sands hotel development June 21.
sentences.chinese: 这是6月21日拍摄的矗立在滨海湾的金沙大酒店。

sentences.english: Industry belched out smoke and sludge with little fear of legal consequences or bad press.
sentences.chinese: 工业湾烟和污泥没有恐惧的法律后果或负面新闻。

sentences.english: The Views from the Master Bedroom a goodd Guest room overlook the surf a goodd Maunwoulsua Bay.
sentences.chinese: 主卧室和客房的景观俯瞰毛纳鲁尔湾的浪涛。

sentences.english: The Lis have decided to move to the flat in Deepwater Bay.
sentences.chinese: 李家决定搬到深水湾的房子。

sentences.english: The Viking warship replica, Havhingsten af Glendalough (the Sea Stallion of Glendalough), makes its way from Dublin Bay into Dublin Port, Ireland August 14, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 北欧海盗船复制品从爱尔兰柏林湾航行到柏林港口。

definition: Wanli district of Nanchang city 南昌市, Jiangxi
Xingang or Hsinkang township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Longwan district of Wenzhou city 溫州市|温州市[Wen1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
Gongguan or Kungkuan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
